attributes.action: announce a national “Random Act of Kindness” day on January the 15th.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Random act of kindness day'
In January when Christmas is over and our spirits are drowning. We are worried about debt and thinking about ourselves. Wouldn’t it be wonderful if just for one day we all go out and commit random acts of kindness? 
Wouldn’t it cure the stress and bring back a bit of British spirit. 
Only with your help can we make this happen.
